price: 30. Xaasaska Nabigow! Mid kastoo idinka mid ah oo la timaadda xumaan (macsi) cad, waxaa loo labalaabi cadaabka,  arrinkaasina Alle wuu u fudud yahay.
arabic: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ مَن يَأۡتِ مِنكُنَّ بِفَٰحِشَةٖ مُّبَيِّنَةٖ يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهَا ٱلۡعَذَابُ ضِعۡفَيۡنِۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yānisāa al-nabiyi man yati minkunna bifāḥishatin mubayyinatin yuḍāʿaf lahā al-ʿadhābu ḍiʿ'fayni wakāna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīran
